name: flat-to-nested
description: Convert a hierarchy from flat to nested representation.
author: Jo√£o Nuno Silva <jnss81@gmail.com> (http://jnuno.com)

scripts.lint: jshint index.js test/test.js && jscs index.js test/test.js
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -o dist/FlatToNested.js -s FlatToNested && uglifyjs dist/FlatToNested.js > dist/FlatToNested-min.js
